text: Musarika (bahudeva-vadi) auratam nala vi'aha na karo. Jadom taka uha imana na lai a'una, ika momina dasi zi'ada cagi hai, ika musarika aurata nalom. Bhavem uha tuhanu zi'ada cagi lagadi hove. Apani'am isatari'am nu musarika maradam nala nikaha na karana devo. Jadom taka uha imana na lai a'una. Momina dasa caga hai. Ika sutatara bala'unde hana ate alaha janata (savaraga) ate apani mu'afi de vala bula'unda hai uha apane adesa lokam la'i sapasata karake bi'ana karada hai tam ki uha nasihata nu laina
